devdoc.details: Contract which manages the swap Process and liquidity accounting and management

InvoiceRegistered((bytes32,bytes32,uint2.details: Event emitted when an invoice is successfully registered

params.invoice: invoice of the swap which is registered on portal chain

LiquidityCommitted((address,address,uint.details: Event emitted when liquidity position is committed for a particular pool

LiquidityLimitUpdated((address,address,u.details: Event emitted when liquidity position is updated

LiquidityRemoved((address,address,uint25.details: Event emitted when liquidity position is removed

SwapCreated((bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,add.details: Event emitted when a swap is registered

SwapMatched(bytes32,address,address,uint.details: Event emitted when a swap is matched

params.matchedBuyAmount: Matched amount of the asset to be bought
params.matchedSellAmount: Matched amount of the asset to be sold

SwapValidated((bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,a.details: Event emitted when a swap is registered

params._assetManager: address of the asset manager contract
params._liquidityPool: address of the liquidity pool contract
params._tokenAddress: address of the portal token contract

params.invoice: lightning Invoice details for the swap

params.liquidityId: liquidity position id referring to the index of the position
params.liquidityPoolId: unique identifier of the liquidity pool

params._poolManager: address of the pool manager contract

devdoc.title: ADMM Contract

assetManager().notice: address of the asset manager contract

commitLiquidity((address,address,uint256.notice: Liquidity Provider's liquidity committed for a concentrated position for a particular pool

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the management contract

createSwap((bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,addr.notice: function to register a swap in Portal Chain

eventOutputs(bytes32).notice: Struct to store mapping of all active event outputs of the swap by secretHash

liquidities(bytes32,uint256).notice: Struct to store mapping of all active liquidityPoolId to liquidity of that liquidityPoolId

liquidityIds(bytes32,uint256).notice: Struct to store mapping of all active matched liquidities with id

liquidityLimits(address,address).notice: Struct to store mapping of all active liquidity limits with sellAsset and liquidityOwner

liquidityPool().notice: address of the liquidity pool contract

matchSwap(bytes32).notice: function to match a swap with a liquidity position

poolManager().notice: address of the pool manager contract

registerInvoice((bytes32,bytes32,uint256.notice: function to register lightning invoice in Portal Chain

removeLiquidity(uint256,bytes32).notice: function to remove liquidity from the pool

setInitialSqrtPrice(address,address,uint.notice: function to set initial sqrt price of the pool

setLiquidityLimit((address,address,uint2.notice: set the liquidity limit for given owner and the asset

setPoolManager(address).notice: set the address of pool manager contract and admin to the factory

sqrtPriceX96ToPrice(uint160).notice: function to retrieve current price of the pool

swaps(bytes32).notice: Struct to store mapping of all active swaps by id of the swap

tokenContract().notice: address of the portal Token contract
